医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
自愿集体隔离无法有效防止 COVID-19 在原住民群体中传播土著人民因持续的 COVID-19 大流行而遭受了不成比例的痛苦。缺乏主权、基础设施有限以及当地医疗保健系统中的歧视等系统性因素使原住民容易感染传染病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Voluntary-collective-isolation-in effective-in-preventing-COVID-19-spread-among-Indigenous-populations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Voluntary-collective-isolation-in effective-in-preventing-COVID-19-spread-among-Indigenous-populations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79ae8708-0e07-47a7-8ad8-71f6455e7250 Thu, 24 Aug 2023 23:46:00 -0400 Voluntary collective isolation ineffective in preventing COVID-19 spread among Indigenous populations
Midnolin 蛋白在分解短寿命核蛋白方面发挥关键作用短寿命蛋白质控制细胞中的基因表达，以执行许多重要任务，从帮助大脑形成连接到帮助身体建立免疫防御。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Midnolin- Protein-plays-key-role-in-writing-down-short-lived-nuclear- Proteins.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Midnolin- Protein-plays-key-role-in-writing-down-short-lived-nuclear- Proteins.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=90f05a0b-aaa9-4281-9721-5e32caed05a0 Thu, 24 Aug 2023 23:42:00 -0400 Midnolin protein plays key role in breaking down short-lived nuclear proteins
内耳胆固醇损失与年龄相关的听力损失有关由布宜诺斯艾利斯大学医学院药理学研究所 María Eugenia Gomez-Casati 领导的研究人员-CONICET； Mauricio Martin，梅赛德斯医学研究所；阿根廷科尔多瓦国立大学的 Martín Ferreyra (INIMEC-CONICET-UNC) 报告称，与年龄相关的听力损失与内耳胆固醇的减少有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Cholesterol-loss-in-inner-ear-linked-to-age-lated-hearing-loss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Cholesterol-loss-in-inner-ear-linked-to-age-lated-hearing-loss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0517f59b-a7d4-4700-8ef1-69ea4e11273a Thu, 24 Aug 2023 23:37:55 -0400 Cholesterol loss in inner ear linked to age-related hearing loss
新研究揭示了 KRAS 突变在胰腺癌中的作用德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心的研究人员发现了 KRAS 突变在胰腺癌中的功能作用，并迅速将这些发现转化为一种新的治疗方法，将 KRAS G12D 抑制剂与免疫检查点抑制剂相结合，用于早期和晚期 KRAS G12D。突变型胰腺癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/New-research-sheds-light-on-role-of-KRAS-mutations-in-pancreatic-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/New-research-sheds-light-on-role-of-KRAS-mutations-in-pancreatic-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a0c87af-4323-4749-be15-bb8b31978e4a Thu, 24 Aug 2023 23:32:00 -0400 New research sheds light on role of KRAS mutations in pancreatic cancer
加州为 17 家陷入困境的医院提供生命线加州中央谷的马德拉社区医院于去年 12 月停止运营，并于 3 月根据美国破产法第 11 章申请破产。周四，加州针对陷入困境的医院设立的新基金表示，准备向该机构提供高达 5,200 万美元的利息，该医院距离重新开放又近了一步。 - 免费贷款。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/California-offers-lifeline-to-17-troubled-hospitals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/California-offers-lifeline-to-17-troubled-hospitals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=49bdc8ce-216b-48be-abf9-5616ed279370 Thu, 24 Aug 2023 23:11:13 -0400 California offers lifeline to 17 troubled hospitals
麻醉师可以在管理物质使用障碍患者方面发挥更大的作用根据《9 月号》上发表的一系列三篇文章，随着酒精、阿片类药物和精神兴奋剂的使用和滥用不断增加，麻醉师可以成为治疗药物使用障碍 (SUD) 患者的护理团队中更不可或缺的一部分。麻醉与镇痛，国际麻醉研究学会的官方期刊。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Anesthesiologies-can-play-a-greater-role-in-managing-病人-with-substance-use-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Anesthesiologies-can-play-a-greater-role-in-managing-病人-with-substance-use-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c34c92c5-4757-42fb-bed8-8f086c7a6da2 Thu, 24 Aug 2023 23:09:16 -0400 Anesthesiologists can play a greater role in managing patients with substance use disorders
脑机接口使严重瘫痪的妇女能够通过数字化身说话加州大学旧金山分校和加州大学伯克利分校的研究人员开发了一种脑机接口（BCI），使一名因脑干中风而严重瘫痪的女性能够通过数字化身说话。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Brain-computer-interface-enables-woman-with-severe-parathesis-to-speak-through-digital-avatar.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Brain-computer-interface-enables-woman-with-severe-parathesis-to-speak-through-digital-avatar.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ffa306b6-d556-4a5b-a8a1-f0fcc091007a Thu, 24 Aug 2023 23:04:52 -0400 Brain-computer interface enables woman with severe paralysis to speak through digital avatar
言语无障碍项目需要更多患有帕金森病的参与者语音无障碍项目第一阶段收集帕金森氏症患者的录音已接近一半。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Speech-Accessibility-Project-needs-more-participants-with-Parkinsons.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Speech-Accessibility-Project-needs-more-participants-with-Parkinsons.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9d668c78-c226-40b0-9d03-8d3953372fdf Thu, 24 Aug 2023 22:58:57 -0400 Speech Accessibility Project needs more participants with Parkinson's
凯克医学院研究人员获得 1200 万美元资助用于研究早期肝移植与酒精相关的肝病占肝脏相关死亡的 50%，并且全球范围内的发病率正在上升。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Keck-School-of-Medicine-researchers-receive-2412-million-grant-to-study-early-liver-transplantation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Keck-School-of-Medicine-researchers-receive-2412-million-grant-to-study-early-liver-transplantation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7af585e-5e1c-4d98-8e5c-24323c7b19d1 Thu, 24 Aug 2023 22:51:49 -0400 Keck School of Medicine researchers receive $12 million grant to study early liver transplantation
SCALE-UP Counts 计划显示短信可以成为公共卫生的有效工具对 SCALE-UP Counts 计划的检查最近发表在儿科杂志上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/SCALE-UP-Counts-program-shows-text-messaging-can-be-an- effective-tool-for-public-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/SCALE-UP-Counts-program-shows-text-messaging-can-be-an- effective-tool-for-public-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b7711d5b-257a-4b14-9140-415748a489c9 Thu, 24 Aug 2023 22:41:29 -0400 SCALE-UP Counts program shows text messaging can be an effective tool for public health
